actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-181.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (H.R.  558) to provide urgently needed assistance to protect and improve the lives and safety of the homeless, with special emphasis on elderly persons, handicapped persons, and families with children.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 558 (programs for the homeless).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (H.R.  558) to provide urgently needed assistance to protect and improve the lives and safety of the homeless, with special emphasis on elderly persons, handicapped persons, and families with children.
